attributes.action: Take more steps to end conflict within the country and with other nations
attributes.additional_details: War and conflict drains the resources of countries- and with current politics going out the window I feel it is important that we prevent future war and conflict. World war 2 created a debt of over £2 trillion worldwide, killed and injured over 60 million people and created a population deficit of 20 million people. What are we doing to stop this happening again?
attributes.background: What is one of the first things we learn in primary school? Don't use words or actions to hurt others- even though we don't like them. So why does this rule not apply to political, social or extremist groups that feel it is acceptable to harm other people because of who they are.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
